ing.item: String beans cut in 1-2" pieces (lightly steamed and cooled)

directions.step:
Date: Mon, 24 Jun 1996 11:36:59 -0400
From: zadofea@matthey.com I stumbled over this very simple recipe for bean salad and have been addicted ever since. I make a huge bowl each week and nibble it when I get the munchies
Drain and rinse the beans very, very well. Mix in all ingredients and pour on seasoned rice vinegar. I usually use 1/2 a cup. Let it sit for at least a couple of hours (it tastes best the next day). Its so simple yet so good.
FATFREE DIGEST V96 #175
From the Fatfree Vegetarian recipe list. Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
